description:
A fan-favorite HBO series has been officially canceled by the network. Sadly, the series has found itself axed, with only three seasons of the show having been produced. The news regarding the show’s cancellation has been shared by its creators, Hannah Boss and Paul Thureen, along with star Bridget Everett and executive producer Carolyn Strauss. [...]

The post HBO Cancels Fan-Favorite Series After Three Seasons appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: HBO Cancels Fan-Favorite Series After Three Seasons

description:
The 2022 horror film Smile was a surprising hit for Paramount. Now the film’s director, Parker Finn, has returned to deliver Smile 2. As you can see below, Paramount has officially unveiled the full official trailer for Smile 2, and it looks like a surprisingly massive take on the modern hit. The sequel revolves around [...]

The post ‘Smile 2’ Trailer: Naomi Scott Is A Pop Singer Spiraling Out Of Control In Horror Sequel appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Smile 2’ Trailer: Naomi Scott Is A Pop Singer Spiraling Out Of Control In Horror Sequel
